column4: pitufoide I'd try selecting different audio output drivers in volume control for a start
pitufoide, additionally, i'd check hardware monitor to see if there is resource draining or DPC latency spikes during these machine gun shots
Netbooks serve their purposes, I'd imagine people in here have much more purposes than netbooks provide
they definately aren't powerhorses. But something small to like lay on the couch with and listen to some streaming music or something ya know
